description: It was a dog eat dog world to live within the Legion. Skill was as much of currency to their people as was Rupees. You were either the best, fighting to be the best, or quite dead.
tooltip: It was a dog eat dog world to live within the Legion. Skill was as much of currency to their people as was Rupees. You were either the best, fighting to be the best, or quite dead. (Attack, Armor, and HP boost from Leveling Up a unit trained from the Holosideros is increased by 10%)
